title: Switzerland to Vote on Capping Population at 10 Million
summary_full: After a campaign by a right-wing opposition party, the government will hold a referendum in June that would require measures to limit immigration.
summary_public: After a campaign by a right-wing opposition party, the government will hold a referendum in June that would require measures to limit immigration.

CH.label: neutral
